Buckle Application
Buckle Application Online–Print Job Employment Form
Apply for Jobs at Buckle Online
Application for Buckle: Buckle does not provide a printable job application. If you want to get a job at Buckle, you must apply for employment on the website by following the link above. Full-time or part-time positions may vary depending on the location.
Interview Tips: Go to the Buckle job interview questions&tips page.
Available Positions at Buckle: Sales associate, management trainee, assistant manager, manager
Minimum Age to Work at Buckle : 18 years old (How old do you have to be to work at Buckle?)
Buckle Hours of Operation: Mon-Sat: 10:00am-9:00pm; Sun: 11:00am-6:00pm
More Information: Buckle Job Info
The online Buckle application will help fasten you to the fashion retail career of your dreams. The employer is looking to hire tons of new associates.
In 1948, Buckle was founded by David Hirschfeld in Kearny, Nebraska. Th Buckle Inc. operates as the parent company of Buckle retail locations. Established as a men’s clothing retailer, the company started selling women’s clothing in 1977. Today, this upscale retailer for clothing, footwear, and accessories operates over 400 Buckle locations in 41 states, employing over 6,000 workers.
Fashion conscious young people just love shopping at Buckle. Stores offer a generous selection of casual apparel, including jeans, tops, sportswear, and outerwear in addition to some fantastic careers. The chain sells brand name merchandise from major labels like Guess, Lucky Brand Jeans, Billabong, and Marc Ecko. Associates at Buckle provide customers with individual attention, even offering free alterations.
There are a host of jobs at Buckle available all across the country. They have entry-level positions for those starting out in the job market, long-term career options for savvy job seekers, and even internships for those looking to slingshot straight to the top. Buckle stores are hiring sales associates for full-time and part-time positions. Seasonal employment openings also exist for the months leading up to the winter holidays. No previous work experience is required to be considered for one of these positions. Buckle only insists that applicants be at least 18 years of age, friendly, and hardworking.
Students and other young fashion enthusiasts are invited to start an internship or a management training program. If you already have the experience and training necessary to oversee store operations, apply online now for a job as an assistant manager. Advancement opportunities exist at all stores. Soon you could be a store manager or even work at a corporate office.
Employees are well compensated at Buckle. On top of competitive pay rates, all associates receive an in-store discount. Sales associates even make commission on sales which supplements income and adds an extra incentive to go above and beyond the call of duty. All full-time workers are also eligible for a comprehensive benefits package consisting of healthcare coverage, paid time off, and more.
How would you like to work at a retailer who cares about its employees just as much as its customers? With so many incentives and opportunities available to workers, who wouldn’t want to fill out an application to work at Buckle? If you’re excited to get your retail career off the ground, apply online with the Buckle job application now. 6 comments: Isabella Moody:
